name: Silk Glow Blush and Highlight Duo
about: What it is:A beautiful blush and a luminous highlighter with a gel-powder texture to deliver a glossy shot of radiance and a flush of color in one sweep..Coverage:Light.Finish:Radiant.Formulation:Pressed Powder.Highlighted Ingredients:- Pearlescent Pigments: Deliver a luminous finish..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, retinyl palmitate, sulfates SLS & SLES, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This butter-soft highlighter and blush duo is packed with pearlescent pigments and combines the finish of a liquid highlighter with the weightlessness of a powder to deliver that lit-from-within glow. It will perk up your complexion to reveal lifted, luminous cheeks with a radiant flush.
ingredients: -Pearlescent Pigments: Deliver a luminous finish..-Emollients: Provide a silky sensorial feel and blurring effect..-Skin Conditioning Agent: Provides a silky feel...Blusher:.Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Mica, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Silica, Glycerin, Dicalcium Phosphate, Peg-12 Dimethicone, Aqua (Water), Polysorbate 20, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Gellan Gum, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil (Cocos Nucifera Oil), Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Calcium Chloride, Dimethicone, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Zinc Stearate, Lauroyl Lysine, Leuconostoc/ Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Sodium Hydroxide. May Contain (+/-): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 73360 (Red 30 Lake)...Highlighter: .Mica, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Glycerin, Silica, Peg-12 Dimethicone, Aqua (Water), Polysorbate 20, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, 1,2- Hexanediol, Gellan Gum, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil (Cocos Nucifera Oil), Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Calcium Chloride, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Dicalcium Phosphate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Leuconostoc/ Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Sodium Hydroxide, Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.For duo-tone cheeks:.-Using a fluffy brush, apply the blush below the apples of your cheeks before applying the highlighter to your cheekbones. .-Swirl your brush across each pan as many times as you like to pick up more pigment and build color...For prismatic perfection: .-Sweep your brush across both shades and let the pure pearl pigments mix on the bristles for a killer high-shine finish. .-Apply all over‚Äîmore is more...For veiled, blown-out blush: .-Apply your blush like a makeup artist. .-Move the blush high on your cheekbones, around your temples, and blend up to your forehead. .-Iconic London loves to apply the Sheer Blush (liquid watercolor formula) and the Silk Glow Duo (each sold separately) to set the look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this blush and highlight duo it‚Äôs my most favorite blush I‚Äôve ever worn or purchased. Stays on all day and it‚Äôs a beautiful color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite. There's a different kind of glow. I use it pretty much everyday but just in case I use any other blush, I still end up topping it up with this one. it's perfectly pigmented, you don't need to overdo.

reviews.review_title: Finally found the perfect blush/highlighter duo!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color of the blush and the highlighter.  Adds just the right amount and the texture is smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pigmented product love it this is my first time at Sephora and it was a good experience

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product the shine is amazing. I would recommend to a friend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been looking to repurchase this! I love a perfect coral blush and this is it! I will keep repurchasing as long as they make this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The highlighter is alright but the blush is not a nice colour and I have to layer it on top of a cream blush to make it show up. Bigger issue is that the product came out of the pans almost right away after a little moving from one bag to another.  Powder is not great quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not too pigmented but highlighter is good. The blush isn‚Äôt like the pictures but still cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The highlighter is beautiful, but the blush is not very pigmented. Not for the blush girlies out there:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I order this online and based my judgement off the advertised photos and my other purchases from Iconic london but this blush had very little pigment. The highlighter was okay but the blush was more glittery than shimmery. Not worth $50

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this around Fall 2022 and I have used it every time I've done my makeup since. Seriously one of the best purchases and items in my collection. Would 100% buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This looked so pretty and I was so excited to get it. But it has hardly any pigment. To get any kind of pigment you really have to work it into your brush. I am so disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I love the color but the pigment is so bad, it got hard panned on me and I can‚Äôt get any color payoff on the blush side and I got the more orange color so I‚Äôm not sure what I‚Äôm doing wrong , I tried different brushes and no luck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Blush is not at bright as I expected but is still very beautiful. Highlight is amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I do agree this blush is not super pigmented, HOWEVER, I have fair skin and it makes me glow beautifully.  I would go for the darker shade if you have medium to dark skin because this probably won't show up. I usually mix both together and apply to my cheeks and it is perfect.  It is a little pricey but the package is absolutely gorgeous, my mouth dropped when I opened it it was so pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately one of the least pigmented blush and highlights I‚Äôve ever tried. No worth $50 !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very rich in colour and extremely buttery. Blends really easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is creamy and stunning. It really pops in the sunlight and perfect for summer. The highlight compliments so well with its gold color giving that bronze goddess glow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iconic London create this beautiful luminous blush with the most blinding and silky highlight that give the most beautiful glow checks for anytime of the year

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The blush is a sheer pop of color with a luminous finish. I love to wear this on top of a cream or liquid blush as a topper. You can use it sheer or build it up but as you build up he color your building up the luminosity then it could start to look funny over textured skin.  I personally use 2 layers of the blush but don‚Äôt need the highlighter but sometimes use 1 sweep Of both.  I use this blush duo all the time over any blush I‚Äôm using cuz your girl loves to glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was uncertain how this was going to work as I didn‚Äôt swatch in the store.  Bought on line at the recommendation of a YouTuber.  I have a blush infatuation so their review made me do it!  Not mad at all.  The finish is flawless, does not emphasize texture and the Rose shade gives a natural flush on my fair complexion. Achieve a subtle look using a light hand and it is buildable.  The highlighter was my greatest hesitation and for no reason. No glitter just a lovely sheen, not high beam gleam - but I am sure you can build a more powerful glow if that‚Äôs your preference.  Packaging is very luxe.  Makes you feel special from the moment you take it out of the box through the application.  Wears well throughout the day.  Really love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The highlighter is wonderful!! Blush was a little less timid for me but highlighter made up for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really am shocked at the good reviews. This is probably the worst blush I‚Äôve ever bought. It is extremely overpriced for what it is. It doesn‚Äôt blend well, difficult to get pigment on the brush, and has huge chunky glitter. The highlight is marginally better but would still be the worst highlighter I‚Äôve ever used too. I don‚Äôt understand why this has been all over Instagram and liketoknowit. I plan on returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This looks absolutely lovely but I agree that it lacks good pigment.  I had to go into the blush several times to get it to show.  Actually it's okay with me as I do not like dark heavily pigmented blush as I get too heavy handed.  The hilighter is okay but does not show up very well either.  Anyway I still like it and may try the Coral.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: No Color payoff, I was really disappointed considering how pigmented it looks. I ended up returning it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The blush looks so rich and pigmented in the pan, but it is not on the face.  You have to add so much to get it to show up, it takes forever. When you rub the blush with your fingers, it feels chalky.  The packaging is beautiful, and the highlight shows up a bit more on the skin. Felt like Makeup Revolution blush. Sephora blush has waaaaaay more pigment!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried both shades rose glow and coral glow. The blushes were not very pigmented and take a lot of work to show up on the skin. The highlighters were very patchy and barely showed up despite how much I applied.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love it! The blush is gorgeous and buildable. By far the best blush I have ever tried. I love the formula of both the blush and the highlighter. Will be using this consistently. Gives you a very natural glowy look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôm surprised this has such great reviews. I thought based on the photos this would be more of a hard-pressed, baked blush and highlight.. but it‚Äôs extremely dusty/chalky. It massive pieces of glitter flying around when I swatched it. I‚Äôve seen drugstore makeup with better quality than this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely stunning! Leaves a shiny, rosy finish! I would definitely buy this product again and want to try more from iconic London.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful design / package palette, however , only the brush works like a dream , the highlight shade is extremely chalky if I‚Äôm paying 2 in 1 ‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs definitely not worth the price tag .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this Blush and highlight and how smooth it applies

reviews.review_title: Love the silky smooth blush and highlighter !
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the blush, perfect shade for my complexion , highlighting is new to me am liking the results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nice blush/ highlighter due. Very natural effect. I use it every day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have tan skin and usually have quite a hard time finding pinks that look good and not like I have heatstroke. This pink, however, is so natural and glowy. It looks perfect and beautiful on my skin. neither the blush nor the highlight feel cakey, very lightweight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush. The colors are super flattering. The blush is smooth to apply and feel like silk on my skin. Fantastic blush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this blush & highlight duo. It‚Äôs the cutest blush color and gives a perfect glow! This has become my new favorite makeup item and it‚Äôs perfect for traveling.

reviews.review_title: Fool proof blush and highlighter duo
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are really nice, sheer blendable products. The blush has a super natural, complements all skin tones hue. And the highlighter is just perfect. It brightens, without being too contrasty, and without being chalky. They both illuminate- without being sparkly. I‚Äôm a bit of a beginner with stuff like this, and it looked good, and I didn‚Äôt feel like I could mess it up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this product! The two pinks go SO well together, and it is a great glowy, but not too intense every day look. I wear this every day!
ABSOLUTELY love this brand!! Such a great formula with great pigment that feels light weight on the skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed!  This corally blush is amazing!  I love how it feels on my skin!  So soft!  A combination of powder and liquid leave your skin once again GLOWY!  The highlighter is outstanding as well.  The quality of this brand is outstanding.  I can't get enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this color and how smooth it applies! Very natural look with a pearl finish!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this blush and highlight duo...it is not crazy pigmented but buildable so it looks very natural and gives you a nice glow.   It almost melts into your skin and it looks like that color is just naturally part of your face, super awesome! I really, really like this and would suggest to buy this before it goes out of stock because once people hear how good it is, It will be gone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the combo pack! It gives a nice sheer look that blends in nicely! Don‚Äôt need to use much to get the desired result!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love my new blush!!! I got it as a gift and i absolutely love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Easy application for a long lasting natural look! Highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The highlighter provides such a pretty luminescence and the blush give a beautiful color. The colors are awesome together. Great product and I love the packaging!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the tones on this duo for a subtle and natural look ! Get that glow !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This highlight duo has been amazing. Received it as a gift and totally didn't think I'd be using it as much as I am! The color is beautiful and it is just the right amount of shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Another great product of Iconic! Nice combination of colors

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The powders leave a lovely shimmery finish and should be pretty compatible with most outfits for a nice, classy look. It's also nice that it is relatively travel-size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent highlighter and blush combo! LOVE the tiny sparkly crystals in the blush!!!  I use the highlighter under my eyeshadow as a base as well has on my cheeks and nose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this, it gives me a soft luminous glow.. its perfect for daily use, yet classy for night, plus the packaging is to die for.. so chic. Totally recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Another hit from Iconic London!  This is the perfect combination of blush + highlighter for a perfect contour!  I love the quality, the gel-like texture that feels so smooth and natural on the skin!  I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this shimmery blush. It‚Äôs small enough to keep it in my everyday makeup bag and it gives a modern-classic look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is so cheap. The first time I opened it everything fell out into the floor and I had to put the powders back together. Just don‚Äôt waste your money. Cheap packaging and the product itself is not great.
